title: 【教卓中心CTE】Four TA courses will be conducted online
author: 游家盛
content:
分類： 其他公告
來源： 教學卓越中心 - 游家盛 - hyttepd@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6589
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 【教卓中心CTE】Four TA courses will be conducted online
日期： Mon, 15 Apr 2024 11:11:21 +0800

Dear TAs
 
Four TA courses will be conducted online,
Center will provide livestream link to your Email one day before the courses.
The course information is below.
Sorry for the inconvenience.
 
以下4門TA課程改為線上直播課程，MS Teams連結於活動前一天發送到您的信箱，造成不便請見諒。
 
	4/22(Mon)18:00-19:30╱Live stream╱華文系林迦音助理╱Guidelines to Using NDHU teaching facilities (CC) (English taught course)
	4/29(Mon)18:00-19:30╱Live stream╱華文系林迦音助理╱NDHU E-Learning(CC) (English taught course)
	5/2(Thu)18:00-20:00╱Live stream╱同志諮詢熱線呂欣潔老師╱ Let’s Build Up A Gender Inclusive Society Together.(English taught course)
	5/3(Fri)13:30-15:30╱Live stream╱國立清華大學謝承諭老師╱BOPPPS for EMI Teaching Assistants(English taught course)

Sign up
https://ndhucte.ndhu.edu.tw/p/405-1008-221807,c21445.php

CTE
